MS MCQs

    Routing and work distribution in Omnichannel for Dynamics 365 Customer Service

    »

    1. What does the application consider when determining whether to send a work item to an agent or not?

      The agent’s presence and number of active sessions

      The agent’s presence and available capacity

      The agent’s working hours

      The agent’s working hours and number of active sessions


    2. What mechanism in Omnichannel for Customer Service provides the guidelines that control how work items (conversations) are routed and distributed?

      Queues

      Channels

      Work streams

      Geo Location records


    3. The application assigned a work item to an agent. What will the agent’s Presence be set to if their used capacity has reached its limit?

      Busy

      Away

      Busy Do Not Disturb

      Offline


    4. When a routing rule is applied to a work item, what will happen to the item if all applicable routing rule item conditions are evaluated as False?

      The item is assigned to the next available agent.

      The item is sent to the organization’s default queue.

      A survey is pushed to the customer to capture additional details.

      The item is converted to a case record so it can be worked on.
